name: Chair Spinning Simulator 2021
description:
If you're here, you definitely know what an office chair is. And you definitely know office chairs can spin. You've spun in one before, everyone does.

And yet you can't shake this feeling: you crave more.

How to play?

Click and drag on the screen to spin the chair. If you spin at the perfect timing, you'll spin extra fast!

Share your highscores in the comments below!

Extra Fluff

This was a submission to KenneyJam 2021 with the theme: Rotation! This game was made possible with the help of @GlassedHouse for his awesome music! With additional credits from zapsplat.com for the sound.

And hey, if you love my stuff, check me out on my Twitter!
